column1: Local Foods////Food: I Â know the crunchy chicken is a favorite... and I love it too
column2: but I've been hooked on the garden sammie ever since I've tried it. It's loaded with roasted veggies. The sandwiches are fantastic
column3: but I'm alos a huge fan of the sides. I've had the slaw
column5: and homemade chips... all are delicious. The combination of flavors is just perfect! Another favorite of mine is the Asian Chicken salad. The portions are generous
column6: but if I split with someone or save some extra room
column7: I like to spurge with the chocolate cupcake. It reminds me of a good ol' homemade chocolate cake my mom and grandma used to make.
